name: SpaceBoy (Ashkor3)
description:
A Boy that play with a Toy that think is a SpaceBoy xD

**CONTROLS**

Space = Thrust 

A = Left Rotation
D = Right Rotation

**7 Levels only 1 Life - Try to not Hit Anything!**

Just unpack game and Run SpaceBoy.exe

                                                   *****IMPORTANT******

Start the Game on Very High for Full Light and Shadows Compability

Have Fun :D
